Text: To play via usb loader  go to usb loader click on the game >settings> load, change dol from default to choose one from list,next option down change it to wii motion dol save and exit, then play game it will play the wii motion video then reset to the wii menu,go back into usb loader choose game again settings again then change the dol back to default save and exit then play the game,after you do this it plays normally everytime
